title: Bloomberg Markets: Hedge Fund Short Sellers Target Small-Caps
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Hedge Fund Short Sellers Target Small-Caps
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Hema Parmar Hedge Fund Reporter Bloomberg Brief Discussing latest hedge fund news from Bloomberg Brief, including a pair of short sellers planning to start a hedge fund to wager on and against small-cap stocks, which are languishing this year following robust gains in 2016.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
